author: jstrachan
msg: use the same ConnectionFactory so that transactional consume + send can use the same session

author: fancy
msg: OPENJPA-360 SQL FOR UPDATE OF incorrectly generated for DB2 UDB version8.1 or earlier and DB2 ISeries V5R3 or earlier.
These  DB2 version also require the "optimize for <n> row" clause appear before FOR UPDATE clause.
Due to this requirement, the OPTIMIZE clause will  appear before FOR UPDATE clause for all DB2 versions.

author: imario
msg: implement Spring's ApplicationContextAware interface to automatically get in touch with its application-context

author: pquerna
msg: Don't call into get_worker while holding the timeout_list mutex.

author: imario
msg: provide a LocalFrameworkAdapter to make Orchestra work in generic non Servlet/JSF environments
